original_text:
CCM Progress Note
**INSTITUTION
Patient :
**NAME[AAA , BBB M]
MRN - **ID-NUM - MPACCOMMMRN
Age :
**AGE[in 60s] years
Sex :
Female
DOB :
**DATE[Jun 17 1944]
Author :
**NAME[XXX , WWW]
Health Status
Summary Statement
I have personally managed this patient in the ICU .
PMI :
Sternum infection , s/p CABG
Surgery :
1/25 Sternectomy
Objective
Radiology Studies :
Chest Radiograph :
There is findings of pulmonary congestion with mild edema with left larger than right bilateral pleural effusions .
Impression and Plan
Respiratory / Pulmonary
Current Respiratory Parameters :
Patient requires mechanical ventilation and the parameters are :
A/C .
PEEP 5 .
The Fi02 is 50 % .
Diagnosis ( es ):
Ventilator dependence .
Respiratory Plan
The patient 's current ventilator parameters are acceptable and will titrate the Fi02 and PEEP to maintain an oxygen saturation &gt ; 92% .
Cardiovascular
Exam Findings
Normal blood pressure .
Regular rhythm : normal sinus rhythm .
Diagnosis ( es ):
Acceptable hemodynamics .
Cardiovascular Plan
Resume home medication  .
Renal / Electrolytes
Diagnosis ( es ):
The patient has clinical findings consisent with normal renal function .
GI / Nutrition
GI / Nutrition Plan
Patient has normal GI function , and feeding will be initiated within the next 24 hours if patient is not extubated or condition changes .
Prophylaxis :
GI Prophylaxis with an H2 blocker .
Infectious Diseases
Diagnosis ( es ):
Sternum infection  .
Infectious Disease Plan
Empiric treatment with vancomycin and cefepime .
Neurology
Exam Findings
General : arousable .
Orientation : oriented to commands .
Motor : normal motor exam .
Diagnosis ( es ):
The patient remains on sedation which I have chosen to continue to maintain patient safety .
The patient will not tolerate removal of sedation .
Lines / Other Prophylaxis
DVT Prophylaxis
SCD s to bilateral lower extremities .
Subcutaneous Heparin :
5000 units BID .
Disposition
Pat. is scheduled for revision on 1/29
I have spent 36 minutes of critical care time managing and monitoring the patient 's care and / or discussing case with patient 's family members .
This is exclusive of any time for procedures or my teaching time

Title : Attending

( on **DATE[Feb 26 2007] 21:46 )
Sign by **NAME[XXX , WWW]
( on **DATE[Feb 26 2007] 21:46 )
VERIFY by **NAME[XXX , WWW]
( on **DATE[Feb 26 2007] 21:46 )
